weapons.name: Crowbill
changes: Anti-horde combo Heavy 1 > Heavy 2 > Light 2 > Heavy 2 > Light 2…
Anti-armor combo Light 1 > Heavy 3 > Light 4.
Light 1 Increased armor damage.
Light 2 Increased cleave.
Light 4 Increased armor damage significantly, Increased headshot multiplier.
Heavy 1 Now breaks shields, Increased cleave.
Heavy 2 Increased cleave.
Heavy 3 Increased armor damage.
Push Increased cost from 1 to 2 stamina.

weapons.name: Dagger
changes: Light attacks Increased headshot multiplier to 3.3, Increased infantry crit damage.
Light 3 Now ignores shields, Now chains into Heavy 2, Gave 10% innate crit chance.
Heavy 1 Now chains into Light 4.
Heavy 2 Now ignores shields, Gave 10% innate crit chance.
Push attack Now chains into Heavy 2 or Light 3, Now ignores shields, Gave 10% innate crit chance, Changed the Bleed to a Burn.

weapons.name: Ensorcelled Reaper
changes: Light 1 Reduced the time to chain into Heavy 2 from Light 1 by 0.04 seconds, from 0.39 to 0.35 seconds.
Light 3 Now breaks shields.
Heavy attacks Reduced the time to chain into heavy attacks from 1 second to 0.7 seconds.
Increased time to chain into weapon swap from a heavy attack by 0.1s (up from 0.5s to 0.6s).
Heavy 2 Increased attack speed by 11%.
Heavy 3 Increased attack speed by 28%.
Push attack Now breaks shields.

Weapon special Increased the time to chain into weapon special by 0.1s from Heavy 1, and by 0.05s from Heavy 2 and Heavy 3. Thus setting the chain timer to 0.7s for all of these attacks,Added a weak DoT that lasts for 7.5 seconds.

weapons.name: Fire Sword
changes: Light attacks Now apply burn.
Light 1 Now an overhead attack that deals the same damage as Light 3.
Light 2 Increased headshot multiplier from 1.5 to 2.
Heavy 2 Doubled the cleave, halved the stagger, Reduced armor damage.

weapons.name: Flaming Flail
changes: Light attack chain now starts with Light 3.
Light 2 Changed chain timers to reduce the delay after the attack inorder to smoothly chain into the following Light.
Swapped Heavy attack order.
Heavy 2 Damage window has been changed from 0.37 to 0.25. Still getting phantom swings. More testing needed…

weapons.name: Mace
changes: Single target combo Heavy 1 > Light 3 > Light 4 > Heavy 1…
Horde clear combo Light 1 > Light 2 > block cancel; or Light 1 > Heavy 2 > Heavy 3 > Heavy 2…
Light 1 Increased damage cleave, Reduced stagger cleave significantly, Reduced berserker damage
Light 2 Now applies burn, Increased damage cleave, Reduced stagger cleave significantly, Reduced berserker damage.
Light 3 Increased armor damage significantly.
Light 4 Increased armor damage significantly, Increased super-armor damage significantly, Increased monster damage.
Heavy 1Reduced super-armor damage by 10%.
Heavy 2 Added armor-sliding, Increased damage cleave, Reduced infantry damage.
Heavy 3 Added armor-sliding, Increased damage cleave, Reduced infantry damage.
Push attack Now applies burn, Reduced berserker damage.

weapons.name: 1h Sword
changes: Light 1 Increased overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.015, from 0.21 to 0.225, Reduced overall damage against the 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.01, from 0.185 to 0.175, Increased Armour damage by 0.3, from 0 to 0.3.
Light 2 Increased overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.015, from 0.21 to 0.225, Reduced overall damage against the 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.01, from 0.185 to 0.175.
Light 3 Now breaks shields, Increased crit armour damage from 0.75 to 0.8, Increased armour damage by 7%.

Heavy 1 Increased damage cleave by 0.45(8.95 in-game), from 0.3 to 0.75(22.38 in-game), Reduced overall damage against the 1st enemy cleaved by 0.02, from 0.32 to 0.3, Increased overall damage against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.02, from 0.18 to 0.2, Reduced overall stagger against the 2nd enemy cleaved by 0.03, from 0.18 to 0.15, Reduced overall stagger against the 3rd enemy cleaved by 0.05, from 0.15 to 0.1, Reduced Armour damage by 0.25, from 0.6 to 0.35

Heavy 2 Anti-armor combo Light 1 > Heavy 2 > Light 3 > Light 1… Breaks shields, Increased armour damage from 0.5 to 0.75, Increased crit armour damage from 0.5 to 0.65, Reduced time to chain into Light 3 from 0.5 to 0.4.
Push Increased cost from 1 to 2 stamina.
Push attack Increased damage against the 2nd and 3rd enemy cleaved by 22% and 29% respectively, Increased headshot multiplier from 1.5 to 2.5.

Weapon special (new) Thrust attack (uses Elven 1h Sword’s Light 3 animation), Has good stagger against most enemies, costs 2 stamina (1 shield), Chains into Light 3, or into Heavy 2, Increased QQ-cancel chain timer by 0.15 seconds, from 0.5 to 0.65 seconds.

weapons.name: Beam Staff
changes: Left click (hold) Increased effective range to 100, Increased infantry damage by 13%, Increased armor damage by 28%.
Left click (blast) Increased infantry damage from 1 to 1.3, Increased infantry crit damage.
Right click Blast cone shortened and narrowed.

weapons.name: Bolt Staff
changes: Weapon special (new) Enables a second zoom level when charging shots.

weapons.name: Conflagration Staff
changes: Adjusted fully charged explosion VFX to be less visually impairing.
Left click Tightened spread, Removed damage drop-off.

weapons.name: Coruscation Staff
changes: Weapon swap time from Geyser now instantaneous.
Left click Reduced infantry damage slightly, Overcharge cost reduced by 1, from 8 to 7.

Geyser Reduced fire patch duration to 3 seconds, Burning DoT now stacks up to 3 max, ticks every second, Partially charged Geyser overcharge cost reduced by 3, from 9 to 6, Fully charged Geyser overcharge cost reduced by 3, from 11 to 8.

weapons.name: Fireball Staff
changes: Adjusted fully charged explosion VFX to be less visually impairing.
Right click Increased Berserker/Monk damage by 1.2, from 0.1 to 1.3, Increase Monster damage and Crit-Monster damage by 0.5, from 4 to 4.5.

weapons.name: Flamestorm Staff
changes: Flamestorm Staff is now a sniping weapon. (!highly experimental!)
Left click Lowered damage but increased stagger, Applies a long lasting burn.
Charged Shot Now releases a fast projectile with slightly higher damage.

weapons.name: Soulstealer Staff
changes: Soul Rip Targeting now prioritizes specials over elites Target priority is specials > elites > everything else, Reduced start delay (from 0.25s to 0.125s).
Number of repeated attacks increased by 1, from 4 to 5.
The repeated attacks now proc Barrage
Reduced final damage tick’s delay by 0.2s (from 0.5s to 0.3s).
Increased Blightstormer damage by 0.25
Increased Leech damage by 0.25.
